import { useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import { Formik } from 'formik'; import * as yup from 'yup'; function ModalAddNew(props){ const {handleClose ,show} = props; const [newCourse, setNewCourse] = useState({ image: '', title: '', description: '' }) const formik = useFormik({ initialValue: { } }) return ( Add New Course
) } export default ModalAddNew;
